Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2008 07:11PM Beth-Ann wrote: I am still getting taxol chemo which is not due to end until 12/26/2008, but due to bad side effects they cut back my taxol by 25% about 3 weeks ago and my hair is starting to grow back already, so I imagine after the completion of taxol it might start to grow a lot faster - smile
